content.question: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Robinson uses literary elements and techniques to convey the significance of the setting for the son and his father.

frqParts.text: Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim regarding how Robinson uses literary elements and techniques to convey the significance of the setting for the son and his father.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
